# class(forAnnotationClass:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a `PDFAnnotation` subclass for a class.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func `class`(forAnnotationClass annotationClass: AnyClass) -> AnyClass
```

## Wrapping Document Elements

- **classForPage()**: Returns a `PDFPage` subclass for a page object.
- **class(forAnnotationType:)**: Returns a `PDFAnnotation` subclass for an annotation type.

items.description: Returns a `PDFPage` subclass for a page object.
items.name: classForPage()

items.description: Returns a `PDFAnnotation` subclass for an annotation type.
items.name: class(forAnnotationType:)
